parameters.name: FromType
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. It is retained for historical compatibility.

parameters.name: KeyWord
parameters.description: The keyword of the template name. By default, a paged query is performed for all templates.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The page number. The default value is 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. The default value is 20.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. It is retained for historical compatibility.
